@dev Fallback function allowing to perform a delegatecall to the given implementation.
This function will return whatever the implementation call returns

@return address of the current implementation

@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.

EternalStorageProxy
Upgraded

This function will return whatever the implementation call returns

@dev Tells the address of the current implementation

nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.name: version

devdoc.details: This proxy holds the storage of the token contract and delegates every call to the current implementation set. Besides, it allows to upgrade the token's behaviour towards further implementations, and provides authorization control functionalities

implementation().details: Tells the address of the current implementation

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a _newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

upgradeTo(address).details: Allows owner to upgrade the current implementation.

params._newImplementation: representing the address of the new implementation to be set.

version().details: Tells the version number of the current implementation
version().return: uint representing the number of the current version

devdoc.title: EternalStorageProxy
